title: Wealthy Investors Want to Combat Climate Change
description: Rebecca Gooch, senior director of research at Campden Wealth, Gamil de Chadarevian, founder, Global Impact Solutions Today (GIST), and Damian Payiatakis, head of sustainable and impact Investing, Barclays Private Bank speak with Penta senior writer Abby Schultz about how global private wealth holders, family offices, and foundations believe it's essential to address climate change through investing.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
